game.name: Dragon's Chronicles~暗黒大魔王と北斗の剣(つるぎ)~
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Command two armies and resolve the continental turmoil in this traditional, robust, and highly authentic simultaneous turn-based strategy.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Command two armies and resolve the continental turmoil in this traditional, robust, and highly authentic simultaneous turn-based strategy.
